channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street needs cleaning, 10th June
item.description:
Entire road needs cleaning. There is rubbish all across the street, loads of litter, food waste, dog-fouling. The road needs to be cleaned ASAP, it does not seem to be happening at all.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Roding Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Restaurant has built exhaust (illegally) very close to residential bedroom windows, 10th June
item.description:
Rao's Bar/Restaurant has built an exhaust that is pumping out fumes next to our (and other's) bedroom window (attached picture). We have a newborn baby who arrived 10 days ago and this is now a critical issue as it is significantly affecting air quality.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dalston Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Tree overhanging drives and pavements causing lots of bird fouling on people's cars a d the yellow stuff that falls from it is slippery, 10th June

item.title: Time for a trim again, 10th June
item.description:
These trees/bushes are constantly oveegrowing onto the public walkway and the longer they get, they halve the space. If we could get this trimmed well above headheight that'd be great so you don't have to duck/walk around.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 254-260, Rotherhithe Street, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bricks missing from school and path gate posts, 10th June
item.description:
There are bricks missing and some severe cracking on the mortar of the gate posts for the primary school and the brick post for the alleyway. I'm scared that the loose bricks will fall and hit a child on the way to school
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Riverside Road, North Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Driveway semi blocked, 10th June
item.description:
This van is blocking my driveway. Yes theres place to access but I dont want to be driving on grass to be able to access my own house. Also builders couldnt come in!

Report on FixMyStreet
